CustomField.description: Detects if User is in Lightning vs. Classic and creates link to Contact
CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK( IF($User.UIThemeDisplayed = "Theme4d", "/lightning/r/Contact/" & npe5__Contact__r.Id & "/view", "/" & npe5__Contact__r.Id), npe5__Contact__r.FirstName & " " & npe5__Contact__r.LastName, "_top")
CustomField.label: Contact Link
